attributes.action: Stop the rollout of requiring a vaccination to gain entry to events & nightclubs
attributes.additional_details: The vaccines are within clinical trial stage. They cannot me made mandatory. Even to gain access to hospitality events. To enforce a rule that impacts an individuals social life and hinders them being able to make plans and spend time with friends and family outside their home can impact them significantly and for the foreseeable future damage there mental health. This rule is discriminatory beyond belief, there's absolutely no reason why a negative test wouldn't be sufficient.
attributes.background: Stop the requirement of vaccination status to gain entry into large events and nightclubs. A negative test if any proof should be sufficient to stop the spread. Vaccinated individuals can still catch and spread Covid 19.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Don't restrict admission to nightclubs to only vaccinated customers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592668

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
